H0.text: In which town in Greater Manchester did Coronation Street actress Betty Driver sadly pass away recently. Manchester

H1.text: In which town in Greater Manchester did Coronation Street actress Betty Driver sadly pass away recently. Salford

H2.text: In which town in Greater Manchester did Coronation Street actress Betty Driver sadly pass away recently. Bolton

H3.text: In which town in Greater Manchester did Coronation Street actress Betty Driver sadly pass away recently. Heaviley

A4.text: Rows of terraces in neighbourhoods such as Seedley and Langworthy – once used for the title sequence of Coronation Street – are being compulsorily purchased, demolished and replaced by 'modern sustainable accommodation'.
